Royal Holloway University of London: Royal Holloway, University of London (RHUL), formally incorporated as Royal Holloway and Bedford New College, is a public research university and a member institution of the federal University of London. It has 6 schools, 21 academic departments and approximately 10,500 undergraduate and postgraduate students from over 100 countries.[5] The campus is located west of Egham, Surrey, 19 miles (31Â km) from central London. It is listed by The Sutton Trust as one of the 30 "most highly selective" British universities.
